experience_assessment: I have published one or two papers in this area.
review_assessment:_checking_correctness_: I assessed the sensibility of the derivations and theory.
I assessed the sensibility of the experiments.
title: Official Blind Review #2
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I made a quick assessment of this paper.
review:
Authors suggest a new technique for embedding point to low-dimensional space. The technique is reminiscent of t-SNE, with the difference that it get weighted triplets (i,j,k) as inputs (meaning that j is closer to i thank). Further a loss function is defined which directly follows t-SNE ideology.

A paper is purely experimental. The only way to judge the quality of its results is to compare 2D pictures of TriMap with other pictures. I did not see any evidence that images of TriMap somehow give a new insight into data (in comparison with other methods).
